See More * 0da89a41833dc1a98958b5e0da759103f7c611df server: use ApiController for server configuration model validation [ #15643 ] * 962c9d1c953d7dbe3c7ef3897bafd94e3f9960e6 httpclient: treat "refresh" as redirect (#15646) * ad26f91ecd1fc1074be958d3ca53b5b91fd61c7b assorted: adding comment re: using cookie method This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Jackett/Jackett/_build/results?buildId=12774&view=logs).

This list of changes was auto generated.
